channel.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
channel.description:
LOL!
It's either I'm missing something here, or i downloaded the incorrect file
Files included within this compressed file include:
Sound Shaders scripts scenes resource particles models media materials maps expressions downloads downloadlists cfg bin steam.inf maplists.txt lights.rad license.txt halflife2.fgd gameinfo.txt detail_xen.vbsp detail_desert.vbsp detail.vbsp bms.fgd base.fgd
BLEGH! Extremely frustrating

item.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
item.dc:creator: Meevinman
item.description:
LOL!

Totally not irrelevant to this thread

But i noticed that BlackMesa has it’s own OS, lol, good job, devs.

Read full topic
item.source: No installation EXE included w/compressed file

item.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
item.dc:creator: Meevinman
item.description:
Wow, THANK YOU!

Didn’t even know there was a separate install exe out there…

Read full topic
item.source: No installation EXE included w/compressed file

item.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Isn’t the folder named “BMS” and not “bms”.
Not sure if caps matters but it could very well.

Read full topic
item.source: No installation EXE included w/compressed file

item.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
item.dc:creator: cman2k
item.description:
and yes, it HAS to be called “bms”. DON’T RENAME IT or it WILL break things.

Read full topic
item.source: No installation EXE included w/compressed file

item.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
If anyone, for any reason, is unable to obtain the setup executable, it’s entirely possible to just unzip all that stuff into a folder called “bms” in the Steam/steamapps/Sourcemods folder. You don’t get to see the neat-looking installer, but that’s basically all it does.

Read full topic
item.source: No installation EXE included w/compressed file

item.title: No installation EXE included w/compressed file
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Download the installer and put it in the same folder as the blackmesa 7zip file.
You can download just the installer here: BlackMesa-Setup.exe

Once the installs finished restart steam and you can launch the game from there.

Read full topic
